title: Please
lyrics:
I think you heard me wrong
I hear your eyes
I think it came out wrong
A pillow of lies
Oh, baby please

Oh, my heart's on the pavement

Oh, baby please

Oh, my heart's on the pavement

Where we're building you and me

Don't cry that way



Oh, no need to hold your head so low

Don't let that devil get you down

The words I use are way too strong, unstable

Come on baby



Oh, baby please

Oh, my heart's on the pavement

Oh, baby please

Oh, my heart's on the pavement

Where we're building you and me

Don't cry that way



I wanna see your smile

I wanna see your smile



Oh, baby please

Oh, my heart's on the pavement

Oh, baby please

Oh, my heart's on the pavement

Where we're building you and me

Don't cry that way



Mhm yourselves

Give me all of you

Give me all of you

My sugarcane

Taste of you

Give me all of you

Taste of you

Give me all of you

Taste of you

Give me all of you

Taste of you

Give me all of you

Taste of you

Give me all of you

Taste of you

Give me all of you
